page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: The Raines family consists of Dad,Eric Raines,Mum,Margret,and Sarah Louise their 10 year old daughter.The elder children Joanne and Phillip are married and no longer live at the family home at 113 Devonshire Drive,Langwith.Dad has retired early from his occupation of a coal miner and now spends his time gardening,watching T.V.helping around the house and playing snooker in the evenings.Mum cleans the house and cooks all the families meals.She produces all the woollen garments worn by the family,which she knits while watching the T.V.Sarah is at Langwith Bassett Primary School during the day and enjoys bike riding,going to the local recreation ground to play on the swings roundabout and slide.The family go shopping to Shirebrook in their flame red Morris Ital.
